ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Tattered Gnomish Cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t heard anything about the gemcutter in a long while.  Last information was that is was a part of an as-to-yet-be-implemented quest, with no current
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't heard anything about the gemcutter in a long
while. Last information was that is was a part of an
as-to-yet-be-implemented quest, with no current
functionality.

Gazamel Prime
55 Gnome Warrior
--- Jason Smith <jason@...> wrote:
> Is there any use for the Gem Cutter yet? I found
> some Crushed Diamonds and
> want to know if it is worth my time to make some.
> Zebbi D'Arcanus
> ECi (55th Gnome Wiz)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Yilmatin Kylari [mailto:yilmatin@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 21, 2000 6:35 AM
> To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Tattered Gnomish Cloak
>
>
> Yep. I got two of them last night.. one dropped from
> a clockwork MA, the
> other from the goblin king! A nice dwarf who was
> farming the zone gave me
> both. They look like red aprentice robes, AC2, Gnome
> only, but the class is
> set to NONE so nobody can wear it.
>
> I combined them with 1 firewater and 1 metal rod,
> and presto: Thermal Cloak!
> AC6, +20 save cold. Gnome only. My skill is at 78,
> if I remember correctly,
> and it was not trivial. But I succeeded on both
> tries.
>
> Would be a neat item to sell if not for the gnome
> only part :)
>
> Yilmatin Kylari
> 51st Rogue of Bristlebane
> Talon Guard
> Bertoxxulous
>
>
> >From: "Drake, Robert, CTR, AFPCA/OPAA"
> <robert.drake@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
> >To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
> >Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Tattered Gnomish Cloak
> >Date: Fri, 21 Jul 2000 08:07:56 -0400
> >
> >Yes, they can't have us gnomes killing other gnomes
> for a tinker item;
> >that'd be gnomicide and hurt our faction. I did
> some exploring of the
> >mining town in Sola, but didn't see it. My bet
> it's on a mob. And like
> >Bronze items in High Keep, it may be possible to
> see it worn on a
> >gob...maybe, I mean.
> >
> >Kilkin
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Kimes, Dean W.
> [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> >Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 6:30 PM
> >To: 'EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com'
> >Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Tattered Gnomish Cloak
> >
> >
> >I'm hoping it's tattered because some gob ripped it
> off a poor gnome
> >miner's
> >body after he killed him. Killing the gob will
> only be the beginning of
> >the
> >revenge process.
> >
> > Leagnomo
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Eric Baker [mailto:ericb76@...]
> >Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 4:33 PM
> >To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
> >Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Tattered Gnomish Cloak
> >
> >
> >Okay, from what I hear the cloak drops in Sol A.
> Does that mean that
> >anyone who wants to tinker a Thermal Cloak(almost
> by definition a gnome)
> >has to camp a gnome to get it? Or do you really
> think they're gonna make
> >it drop from a gob?
> >
> >
> >Caldiren Doppleganger
> >
> >46 Enchanter of Bertox
> >
> >
